overview: Wrestle HARD. 8 jocks are pitted against each other one on one. The HardGear wrestling ring is primed, clear, ropes tightened and ready for a scrap! Square up, size up, oil up and get ready to Grapple! In College style wrestling scenes we have 2 dry regular wrestles and 2 wet wrestles. Getting the pool out we start with a good old-fashioned lube wrestle, youâ€™ll have fun watching the guys slip and slide over one another. Slightly more unconventional is our blue and red gunge wrestle which very quickly turns into purple! The guys end up absolutely covered! The dry wrestles are not so dry after all, sweat and oil make it just that little bit more difficult to grab and throw, more fun for viewing!
title: GRAPPLD
